event.title: 1614 to the 1740s, Dawei was the southernmost city under Burmese authority, and was defended

data.event: From 1614 to the 1740s, Dawei was the southernmost city under Burmese authority, and was defended by a Burmese garrison.
Burma regained the city in 1760, and extended its control over the entire Tenasserim coast in 1765.

event.title: extended its control over the entire Tenasserim coast in 1765

data.event: Burma regained the city in 1760, and extended its control over the entire Tenasserim coast in 1765.
